text:
WITH Elton John as your neighbour and Kirsty Gallacher as your sister, Laura Gallacher has always known the world of showbiz.

She is now married to Russell Brand, and they live happy life with their ever-expanding family.

1 Laura Gallacher is happily married to comedian Russell Brand Credit: Rex Features

Who is Laura Gallacher?

Born 28 June 1987, Laura is the daughter of golfer Bernard and sister of TV presenter Kirsty Gallacher.

They grew up on the Wentworth Estate in Surrey, where they were lucky enough to share a neighbourhood with the late legend Bruce Forsyth.

The plush area has also been the home of Elton John and Cliff Richard.

In 2020 she released her first book, The Joy Journal, which has since become her brand.

Entrepreneur Laura also has her own fashion brand, where she sells dungarees.

On her official website, she writes: “The Joy Journal is about creativity, colour, individuality and fun.

"These dungarees are an expression of that spirit. Craft, not couture, comfortable cool, not catwalk. These dungarees are the first Joy Journal Project.”

Laura has an impressive 130K followers (as of September 2022) on her Instagram page @thejoyjournal.

How long have Laura Gallacher and Russell Brand been together?

His marriage to Katy Perry only lasted 14 months – but this didn't put Russell off getting hitched for a second time.

The serial womaniser and former Bizarre Shagger of the Year popped the question to long-term girlfriend Laura Gallacher in June 2016.

In August 2017, the pair tied the knot in an intimate service at Remenham Church near their home in Henley-on-Thames, Oxon.

How many children do Laura Gallacher and Russell Brand have?

The couple has two daughters, Mabel born in November 2016 and Peggy who arrived in July 2018.

The parents like to keep their family private, and he announced their happy news of Mabel's birth during his gig at the Nottingham Playhouse.

Doting parents Russell and Laura are regularly spotted on day-trips with the tot, and have even taken her to New York.

In June 2018 it was revealed that the pair were expecting their second child after Laura was pictured with a baby bump, and they welcomed Peggy the following month.
title: Who is Laura Gallacher? Russell Brand’s wife and Kirsy Gallacher’s sister – The Sun
